channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Content Navigator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Content Navigator

item.title: CVE-2017-1282|2024-08-05T13:32:27.886Z -- ibm%20corporation -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator & CMIS 2.0 and 3.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124760.

item.title: CVE-2017-1146|2024-08-05T13:25:17.294Z -- ibm%20corporation -- content%20navigator
item.description: IBM Content Navigator 2.0.3 and 3.0.0 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM Reference #: 1999736.
